title: Mobileye to acquire Mentee Robotics for $900M in bid to dominate physical AI
description:
Mobileye is acquiring Mentee Robotics for $900 million to pursue leadership in both autonomous driving and humanoid robotics.

The post Mobileye to acquire Mentee Robotics for $900M in bid to dominate physical AI appeared first on The Robot Report.
